name: part_004
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】THE DAY ⧸ 重大告知あり！【#角巻わため生誕祭2023】 [R3hmYr58m6E]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Kujira' by Tsunomaki Watame on an underwater-themed stage.
Musical interlude with light effects and camera panning as the scene transitions to the next song.
Performance of the song 'Ame' (Rain) by Tsunomaki Watame.

subtitles.original: どこに触れ合わしたって
subtitles.english: No matter where we touch

subtitles.original: 私の指先はひどく
subtitles.english: My fingertips are terribly

subtitles.original: 切り裂かれるの
subtitles.english: torn apart

subtitles.original: 出会ったのも罪
subtitles.english: Meeting you was a sin

subtitles.original: 恋したのも罰という存在
subtitles.english: Loving you is a punishment

subtitles.original: 胸を締め付ける
subtitles.english: Tightening my chest

subtitles.original: 狂おしい気付かないで
subtitles.english: Don't notice how mad it is

subtitles.original: 私にください痛いほどいいの
subtitles.english: Give it to me, even if it hurts

subtitles.original: 気持ち裏腹で意地悪な私
subtitles.english: My feelings are the opposite, I'm being mean

subtitles.original: 嫉妬隠せない惨めな私
subtitles.english: I can't hide my jealousy, I'm miserable

subtitles.original: 隣の恋人妬んでる私
subtitles.english: I'm jealous of the lovers next to me

subtitles.original: 自分愛せない私
subtitles.english: I can't love myself

subtitles.original: 大きな海に抱かれてみたいのよ
subtitles.english: I want to be embraced by the vast sea

subtitles.original: 時折水面に顔を覗かせて
subtitles.english: Occasionally peeking my face above the water

subtitles.original: 月を眺めて歌を歌う
subtitles.english: Gazing at the moon and singing a song

subtitles.original: 傷付いた鯨と一緒に
subtitles.english: Together with the wounded whale

subtitles.original: 覚えておいてね私のことを
subtitles.english: Please remember me

subtitles.original: 空まで届くの
subtitles.english: Reaching up to the sky

subtitles.original: 愛した真実無くした事実
subtitles.english: The truth of having loved, the fact of loss

subtitles.original: ささやかな落日
subtitles.english: A modest sunset

subtitles.original: 生まれ落ちた罪
subtitles.english: The sin of being born

subtitles.original: 生き残る罰という存在
subtitles.english: The existence of survival as a punishment

subtitles.original: 一瞬のときめき永遠のサヨナラ
subtitles.english: A moment's fluttering, an eternal farewell

subtitles.original: ママ許されないのかな
subtitles.english: Mama, will I not be forgiven?

subtitles.original: 伸ばす手はどこへ
subtitles.english: Where is my reaching hand going?

subtitles.original:
雨
作詞・作曲 常田大希
subtitles.english:
Ame
Lyrics/Composition by Daiki Tsuneta

subtitles.original: 誰も知らない名もない今を駆けて行くの
subtitles.english: Running through this nameless 'now'

subtitles.original: 雨に霞き消えて手を伸ばして
subtitles.english: Fading away in the rain, reaching out my hand

subtitles.original: 君を知りたい声にならない臆病な朝も
subtitles.english: I want to know you, even on cowardly mornings

subtitles.original: たとえ何度書き換えようと思う
subtitles.english: No matter how many times I think of rewriting it

subtitles.original: へその緒がパチンと切られたその時
subtitles.english: When the umbilical cord was snapped

subtitles.original: 世界とはぐれてしまったみたいだ
subtitles.english: It felt like I got separated from the world

subtitles.original: 目に映る景色が悲しく笑うなら
subtitles.english: If the scenery in my eyes smiles sadly

subtitles.original: 恐れず瞼を閉じてごらん
subtitles.english: Try closing your eyelids without fear

subtitles.original: さぁ皆さんこちらへと底なしの方へさぁ
subtitles.english: Come everyone, towards the bottomless depths

subtitles.original: 踵打ち鳴らせと心踊る方へさぁ
subtitles.english: Click your heels towards where your heart dances

subtitles.original: 蜃気楼に飛び乗って逆さまな世界乗りこなして
subtitles.english: Jump on a mirage and master the upside-down world

subtitles.original: 止まない愛を知りたいと願うおまじない
subtitles.english: A spell to wish to know unending love

subtitles.original: 時を超えて逆らう夜まで
subtitles.english: Crossing time until the night we defy

subtitles.original: 君を知りたい何一つ見逃さぬように
subtitles.english: I want to know you, so I don't miss a thing

subtitles.original: 時は誰も待ってくれないの
subtitles.english: Time waits for no one

subtitles.original: 残酷な運命が抗えぬ宿命が
subtitles.english: Cruel fate, irresistible destiny

subtitles.original: 考える間もなく押し寄せ砂嵐で
subtitles.english: Rushing in like a sandstorm without time to think

subtitles.original: 前が見えなくたって君を信じてみたいの
subtitles.english: Even if I can't see, I want to believe in you

subtitles.original: 恐れずに一歩踏み出したら
subtitles.english: If you take a step without fear

subtitles.original: さぁ皆さんこちらへと底なしの方へさぁ
subtitles.english: Come everyone, towards the bottomless depths

subtitles.original: 踵打ち鳴らせと心踊る方へさぁ
subtitles.english: Click your heels towards where your heart dances

subtitles.original: さぁ皆さんこちらへと底なしの方へさぁ
subtitles.english: Come everyone, towards the bottomless depths

subtitles.original: 踵打ち鳴らせと心踊る方へさぁ
subtitles.english: Click your heels towards where your heart dances

subtitles.original: 空飛ぶ鯨に飛び乗って
subtitles.english: Jump on a flying whale

subtitles.original: 逆さまな世界踊り尽くせ
subtitles.english: and dance through the upside-down world

subtitles.original: 誰も知らない名もない今を駆けて行くの
subtitles.english: Running through this nameless 'now'
